name: Bracket
title: docs.bracketapp.nl
shortDescription: Bracket is a robust tournament management system designed for anyone needing to organize competitive events. It allows users to build setups, schedule matches, and track scores, all while presenting live rankings to the public. This tool is ideal for sports leagues, e-sports events, and other competitive gatherings. With features like drag-and-drop match scheduling and support for multiple tournament types, Bracket simplifies the management process without sacrificing flexibility.
pros: Live public display of schedules and rankings
cons: Limited user support typical of free tools
May require technical skill to deploy and customize

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Battlefy
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Focuses on e-sports with robust features

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Smash.gg
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Popular in gaming communities for tournaments
